text: João José Pereira de Lyra (17 June 1931 – 12 August 2021) was a Brazilian businessman and politician. He was a Member of the Federal Senate from 1989 to 1991, and a Member of the Chamber of Deputies from 2003 to 2007, and from 2011 to 2015. He was born in Recife, Brazil. Lyra died on 12 August 2021 in Maceió, Brazil of problems caused by bronchopneumonia, aged 90.João Lyra morre aos 90 anos em Maceió ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Brazilian businesspeople Category:Politicians from Pernambuco Category:People from Recife
title: João Lyra
